title: AI Revolution: Job Creator Not Job Destroyer
description: Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal emphasized that Artificial Intelligence (AI) holds significant potential for job creation in India. He instructed officials to utilize AI tools, like ChatGPT, responsibly. Despite concerns about automation affecting jobs, Goyal assures AI will boost employment and technological advancement, advocating for its ethical use.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is poised to revolutionize the job market in India, according to Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal. Speaking at an industry event, Goyal stated that AI will not reduce employment, but rather increase job opportu... [653 chars]

title: Social Security Praises Its New Chatbot. Ex-Officials Say It Was Tested But Shelved Under Biden.
description: Social Security, under the leadership of a tech enthusiast, rolled out an artificial intelligence-powered chatbot to answer calls. But as beneficiaries complain about glitches, lawmakers and former officials ask whether it’s a preview of a less human agency at which rushed-out AI takes the place of pushed-out government workers.
content: John McGing couldn’t reach a human. That might be business-as-usual in this economy, but it wasn’t business; he had called the Social Security Administration, where the questions often aren’t generic and the callers tend to be older, disabled, or oth... [8871 chars]

title: Career crossroads: Will AI replace or reinvent publishing jobs?
description: Artificial intelligence is changing the school publishing industry by blending human creativity with machine efficiency. This shift raises ethical questions and redefines the roles of authors and editors in educational content creation.
content: Artificial Intelligence is no longer just a buzzword-it's rewriting the rules of publishing. From drafting manuscripts and editing text to designing covers and marketing books, AI is stepping into roles once reserved for humans. In a conversation wit... [3253 chars]

title: Solow Paradox: The productivity puzzle of AI can be cracked
description: The adoption of artificial intelligence (AI) seems to have let adopters down on productivity. But then, as seen in banking, it depends on what AI is adopted for: to improve decisions, for example, or automate suboptimal processes?
content:
In 1987, having monitored the computer usage boom for over a decade, Nobel Laureate Robert Solow commented, “You can see the computer age everywhere but in the productivity statistics."
This phenomenon of extensive use of advanced technology without ... [5684 chars]

title: AI and ML demand rises 54% in August with non-IT sectors leading growth
description: Hiring for Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) roles soared by 54% in August 2025, highlighting the rising demand for specialised tech talent, as per Naukri JobSpeak. While IT services hiring dipped, non-IT sectors like insurance, hospitality, and real estate drove overall job market growth.
content: Demand for Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) talent surged in August 2025, with hiring for these roles climbing 54%, according to the latest Naukri JobSpeak report. The spike underscores how businesses are ramping up recruitment ... [1385 chars]

title: Here's Why This Stock Is Rated 'Outperform'
description: Bajaj Finance shares were trading in the green after CLSA maintained its 'outperform' rating with a target price of Rs 1,150. The brokerage is positive about the company's medium-term loan growth and sees positive momentum driven by strategic business decisions. Bajaj Finance is actively integrating artificial intelligence across its business operations, a move that is expected to enhance efficiency of offerings.

title: OpenAI plans giant 1 GW AI data centre in India, Sam Altman may reveal details soon
description: OpenAI, the creator of ChatGPT, is preparing for a big move in India with plans to build one of the country’s largest artificial intelligence data centres. The facility is expected to have at least 1 gigawatt of capacity, making it a project of huge scale.

title: Humans In Demand To Clean Up AI's Mess Amid Job Loss Fears
description: Companies and startups are now turning to human experts to fix the mess created by the use of artificial intelligence.
